Attributes.description: Theoretical and applied ecology of microbes. Focus on microbial symbionts of animals, plants and seaweeds. Research project development through critical analysis of microbial ecological literature and computational analysis of ecological data.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: BIOL 121 and one of BIOL 300, FRST 231, STAT 200. (Fourth-year standing.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 11:00, End Time: 12:00, Building: To, Room: Be
